text: hi everyone is Helen here today I could
be making chocolate cake or one
chocolate as you know in Vietnam we
don't really have a baking culture and
in the traditional Vietnamese kitchen
there's actually no oven
so ingredients like a wheat flour or
fresh milk and not that commonly in
suits remember in the old days the only
occasion that I would be able to eat
Western case on birthdays some history
about this recipe when I was living in
Germany and I was holding our party at
home a friend of mine brought this
chocolate cake to the party and after I
gave it a try I were like so surprised
because I couldn't believe that a guy
can make such a delicious cake so I
asked him for the recipes and after he
share with me the recipe I was even more
surprised because it's actually so easy
basically you just measure all the
ingredients and mix them together and
bake so since then this chocolate cake
is like my secret weapon every time I
need to bake a cake to give to someone
birthdays or some special occasion I
would definitely make this chocolate
cake because I know that I would never
mess up with it so today I'm really
really glad to share with you this
recipe so let's begin
recipes the ingredients you can a need
to know 50 gram of butter 90 gram cacao
powder 300 grams sugar 225 grams of
all-purpose flour
ready 5 gram milk 4 eggs 1 and 1/2
teaspoon of baking powder and her 40
grams of coconut flakes for the
chocolate icing of the cake you get an
825 gram up whipping cream and hundred
50 gram of dark chocolate frosted crack
the eggs in a bowl and beat up lightly
then add the milk and mix well in a
large mixing bowl mixing all the dry
ingredients the aquifer flour sugar
cocoa powder and baking powder
I prefer sifting all the ingredients to
avoid the lumps also add all the coconut
flakes is the coconut flakes that give
the cake an amazing taste and make it
taste really special compared to other
chocolate cakes that I have tried then
make a hole in the center and pouring
the egg mixture and also the butter you
can also melt the butter in the
microwave first so it can mix in faster
it's really hot where I live right now
so I just make in the butter is going to
melt in the K butter anyway just mix
them all up to get a really shiny butter
there's no special mixing method for
this cake you're just mixing whatever
method that you like then pour the
butter into the TEC penlight with some
parchment paper to avoid sticking bake
in a preheated oven at 160 degrees
Celsius for one hour when you insert the
skewer into the center of the cake and
it's come out clean as when is fully
cooked remove the cake from the pan and
let it rest on a rack to cool now
completely
next break up the chocolate and place in
a bowl then place the ball over a
saucepan of water making sure the bottom
of the bowl doesn't touch the water add
in the cream and bring the saucepan of
water to a boil stir occasionally to
help the chocolate melt when the
chocolate and cream are fully
incorporated it will look like this let
it cool down a little and then we can
spread the chocolate icing all over the
cake
if you can't manage to get the chocolate
cover evenly on the surface of the cake
as completely okay because you're going
to sprinkle some more cacao powder over
it for the size you can do some sort of
pattern that you like I just do it
simple like this that's it is done you
can put candles on top if you making for
someone's birthday I'm just gonna put
some cute shaggy pics that I got from
Japan they are so kawaii now I can't
wait to cut out a slice
the chocolate cake is so dense and moist
the coconut flakes really make the taste
outstanding if you are a chocolate and
coconut lover at the same time then this
case is a total must try plus is so easy
to make and you can never go wrong with
the recipe if you liked this video don't
forget to click like and subscribe to my
channel for more delicious cooking
videos if you decide to try out this
recipe don't forget to take a photo of
your chocolate cake and upload on
Instagram Facebook or teacher with a
hashtag Thailand recipes so I can see
how great your cake turned out thank you
for watching bye bye
